en: Coach Henry A. Kean with the Coach of the Year and Football Co-Championship trophies in 1954

The football coach of Tennessee A & I State College, Henry A. Kean holds the trophies for the Lucius L. Jones Memorial Award for Coach of the Year and the W. A. Scott, II, Memorial Award for Intercollegiate Football Co-Champions of 1954. The awards were presented in Atlanta on January, 28, 1955.

The football coach of Tennessee A & I State College, Henry A. Kean holds the trophies for the Lucius L. Jones Memorial Award for Coach of the Year and the W. A. Scott, II, Memorial Award for Intercollegiate Football Co-Champions of 1954. The awards were presented in Atlanta on January, 28, 1955.
University of Tennessee, Knoxville. Special Collections
